subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Brakemen never lay eyes on the finish line: with their heads buried and their trust in the pilot, they basically hang on, speeding along at 80 m.p.h. in total darkness.
snippet: Brakemen never lay eyes on the finish line: with their heads buried and their trust in the pilot, they basically hang on, speeding along at 80 m.p.h. in total darkness.
